citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:00 PM on 23-
MAY-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and spoke to a family member who stated the licensee was not home.
Licensee was called and they stated they would not be available for inspection for about 2 hours.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:00 PM on 23-
MAY-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and spoke to a family member who stated the licensee was not home. 
Licensee was called and they stated they would not be available for inspection for about 2 hours. 
 
 
 
End Section
